iati-activity.title: Guiana Shield Facility
iati-activity.description: GSF promoted as a sustainable financial vehicle for the conservation and sustainable development of the Guiana Shield ecoregion.

indicator.title: Output Indicator

actual.comment: i. 4 [+ 2 states in 1] ii. Both the mid-term evaluation report and II Regional Advisory Board meeting have recommended that the GSF remains at the UNDP Guyana, retain the existing implementation framework until end of current project on 31 December 2014, and to develop a multi-programme pilot for the medium-term; iii. 8 iv. Online perception survey discontinued owing to poorness of response; v. 7. vi. 0 vii 0%. However, GSF's support to MRVS in Guyana allows access to Norway grant (up to USD250 million), and to R-PP in Suriname leveraged USD3.8 million for REDD+; vii. No signed agreement between Guiana Shield countries. The Bogota Declaration provides the framework and starting point for such an agreement. ix. Media coverage achieved x. 500 per month mostly from Europe and the Americas xi 2 xii. 4 xii 0

i. 4 [+ 2 states in 1 + subnational authority in 1 participating] ii.Third Regional Advisory Board meeting upheld recommendation that the GSF remains at the UNDP Guyana. Project life and DIM authorisation was extended to 31 December 2015. A multi-partner programme was developed; iii. 8 iv. Online perception survey discontinued owing to poorness of response; v. 7 vi. 0 vii 0%. However, GSF's support to MRVS in Guyana allows access to Norway grant (up to USD250 million), and to R-PP in Suriname leveraged USD3.8 million for REDD+; vii. No signed agreement between Guiana Shield countries. The Bogota Declaration provides the framework and starting point for such an agreement. ix. Media coverage achieved x. 500 per month mostly from Europe and the Americas xi 2 xii. 4 xii 0

Percent of formalized/registered businesses
